title: Alleged mastermind among four arrested after Pakistan mosque blast
description: The four are suspected of facilitating a suicide bombing that killed more than 30 people, Pakistan's interior minister said.
content:
Four people have been arrested on suspicion of facilitating a suicide bombing that killed more than 30 people on Friday, Pakistan's interior minister has said.
Mohsin Naqvi said an Afghan national who is alleged to be the mastermind behind the attack... [1219 chars]

title: France investigates ex-minister Jack Lang over Epstein links
description: The socialist grandee quits his role at a prestigious institute as he is investigated for the "laundering of tax-fraud proceeds".
content:
Financial crime prosecutors in France say they have opened a preliminary inquiry into former Culture Minister Jack Lang over his links to Jeffrey Epstein.
Lang, a major figure in French socialist governments between the 1980s and 2000s, is being inve... [3081 chars]

title: Winter Olympics organisers refuse to deny Mariah Carey lip-synced in opening ceremony
description: The organisers of the Winter Olympics hailed Mariah Carey’s ‘extraordinary’ performance despite social media users questioning whether she was singing live
content: The organisers of the Winter Olympics opening ceremony have refused to deny speculation that the US pop diva Mariah Carey lip-synced her part in the show. Carey took to the stage to sing Domenico Modugno’s Nel Blu, dipinto di Blu in Italian, followed... [4062 chars]

title: Tom Brady reverses course after backlash and now wants Patriots to win Super Bowl
description: As the New England Patriots prepare for Sunday’s Super Bowl, Tom Brady has decided he is backing his former team after all
content:
As the New England Patriots prepare for Sunday’s Super Bowl, Tom Brady has decided he is backing his former team after all.

title: Arne Slot could fail to deliver what Virgil van Dijk is desperate for at Liverpool
description: Virgil van Dijk has made a concerning admission to Gary Neville that Liverpool manager Arne Slot may not be able to deliver.
content:
Liverpool’s attempted defence of their Premier League title under Arne Slot has not gone to plan.
After spending over £400m in the summer transfer window, many likely expected the Reds to walk the league this season.
